content:
# I successfully crafted 2 Copper Cables using 1 Copper Plate, leaving me with 16 Copper Plates in my inventory. 
# However, I still need 3 Copper Cables to craft 1 Electronic Circuit, so I will need to craft more Copper Cables.

# Since I have 16 Copper Plates remaining, I can craft additional Copper Cables. 
# I will craft 2 more Copper Cables, which will require 1 additional Copper Plate.

# Let's proceed to craft the additional Copper Cables.
craft_item(Prototype.CopperCable, quantity=1)  # Crafting 1 more Copper Cable to meet the requirement.

# After crafting, I will check my inventory again to confirm the number of Copper Cables produced.
print(f"Inventory after crafting additional Copper Cables: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after crafting.
